about_the_game:
DURT is a block-based puzzle game where the deep underground mines have collapsed in on the unfortunate workers and there is only one mole brave enough to dare rescue them from this hazardous environment.



Journey into the 5 unique worlds filled with more than 100 expertly crafted puzzles that maximize each of the block's unique effects. Tunnel through dirt, dodge traps, and manipulate complex contraptions to solve the mine's puzzles and rescue the trapped miners! Once you have bested the story mode, go get your hands dirty creating and sharing your own puzzles using the in-game level editor or explore the community's puzzling creations via the Steam Workshop!

Key Features:

  • Dig up the earth, dodge traps, and rescue all of the miners
  • More than 100 intricately designed puzzles
  • Navigate the non-linear underworld map and beat each of the 5 uniquely themed worlds
  • 25 unique block mechanics to learn and master
  • Challenge mode Canaries in each level to push your understanding to its limits
  • In game level editor to design your own puzzles and share with others through the Steam Workshop
  • Endless replayability with downloadable levels created by the community
  • Both keyboard and controller are supported


The game was originally made for the CafeDot 2023 Game Jam and won 1st place for the admin award. DURT was made with Godot Engine.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18+
  • Processor: 2GHz, 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for Vulkan 1.2
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional space required for levels downloaded from Steam Workshop. Internet required for Steam Workshop downloads.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18+
  • Processor: 3GHz, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for Vulkan 1.2
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional space required for levels downloaded from Steam Workshop. Internet required for Steam Workshop downloads.

name: DURT

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for Vulkan 1.2
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional space required for levels downloaded from Steam Workshop. Internet required for Steam Workshop downloads.

short_description: Dig into this block-based puzzle game where you must master the elements of the subterranean world to rescue the miners trapped within. The deeper you delve, the more challenging the rescue becomes.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
